ui:options.title: All Operators
ui:options.description: Retrieve a list of all approvals for a specific owner address. This list can be filtered to include or exclude expired approvals and can be paginated with 'limit' and 'start_after' parameters.

ui:options.title: Owner Address
ui:options.description: The address of the token owner for whom to list operators.

ui:options.title: Include Expired Approvals
ui:options.description: Toggle whether to include approvals that have already expired.

ui:options.title: Results Limit
ui:options.description: The maximum number of approval entries to return.

ui:options.title: Start After Address
ui:options.description: The address after which to start listing approvals, for pagination purposes.
